item.title: VIKING ENERGY GROUP INC 10-K
item.description: VIKING ENERGY GROUP INC, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 20, 2022 had 33895 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
